content: As you approach, a mysterious woman (the same one that killed the yaoguai at the start of the chapter) will silence the lanterns, before offering up that there's a supposed treasure beyond the archway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdure Bridge'.
The content is as follows:
As you approach, a mysterious woman (the same one that killed the yaoguai at the start of the chapter) will silence the lanterns, before offering up that there's a supposed treasure beyond the archway.
